message.body: Hey Andrew it's hunter. I was wondering if you wanted to pick up some extra work tomorrow. Sweating toilet and bathroom sink shutoffs, installing pedestal sink, faucet and p trap, installing toilet.
possibly. wheres the job. and whats the time frame for finishing the trim
25th and Cecil b Moore. I'll be there til probably 630pm. U could stay later but you'd need to be there by 6pm. If u can't do it tomorrow I'll just end up doing it.
What's your rate? Or price for that job?
I have another appointment at 6 p.m. Tomorrow sorry. with a bit more notice I would have been able to do this
Ok. I might have something else for you at this site later. I'll give you some lead time notice for it.
The other job would be replacing strainers, drain and s trap on a double bowl kitchen sink, plus installing a garbage disposal. Maybe Saturday or Sunday I could have the electrical ready for it
cool my rate is 60 an hour plus parts
Ok it's gonna be cheaper for me to just do it. I'll let you know if I get slammed and need help meeting deadlines though
